titles: The vveavers request. Or, Their just complaint against the rude rabble that revile against the gentile mode now in fashion. To the tune of, Ladies of Lodon. This may be printed. R.P.
publisher: Printed for J[osiah]. Blare at the Looking-glass on London-Bridge,
notes: Wing CD-ROM, 1996 gives range of dates: 1682-1700. Place of publication and publisher's name from Wing CD.
Verse - "We the brave weavers of ancient renown,".
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford, England.
keywords: Weavers --  England --  London --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
